name: Spite: Drowned Souls
description:
Delve deep into the swamps of Nwaye as a young Witch Doctor determined to lift the curse upon the land. Use magic spells as well as a mysterious mask to change form into a powerful avatar form and assault your enemies in melee combat.

Developed as a school project over 14 weeks at The Game Assembly in Malmö, Sweden.

Disclaimer: We have had some issues with getting the game to work on certain computers, specifically if you use an AMD graphics card or cards from the 2000- and 3000-series from Nvidia. Our apologies if it doesn't work on your PC.
